official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income amounts otherwise includible on the surrender or cancellation of any life insurance policy which are used to pay long-term care insurance premiums.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of an individual otherwise taxable amounts derived from the whole or partial surrender, cancellation, or exchange of any life insurance policy if: (1) the individual is age 65 or older on the date of the transaction; and (2) the amounts in question are used to pay premiums for an insurance policy covering at least 12 months of medically necessary nonemergency care for the individual or a spouse meeting the same 65-year age requirement.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income amounts otherwise includible on the surrender or cancellation of any life insurance policy which are used to pay long-term care insurance premiums.
